resources.string:
The hip, urban heart of Florida’s Gulf coast beats in Tampa Bay. Discover Florida’s most diverse travel destination. 
 
With its mix of historic architecture and modern landmarks, a culture infused with Cuban and Spanish flavors, vibrant business districts and beautiful waterways, Tampa is a wonderful place to work, play and unwind. 
 
Tampa is known for being a great city for all ages and tastes, offering hotel accommodations that fit any budget and catering to everyone, including families, outdoor adventure seekers, and foodies and wine connoisseurs. Once known as a melting pot for all cultures and settlers, Tampa remains a welcoming place for those seeking fun, opportunity and a chance to try new things. While it’s only a short, 30-minute drive to the beaches, Tampa’s real strengths lie in its city life.
Located right across the street from Busch Gardens® Tampa, Adventure Island® is 30 acres of water-drenched fun.
Go beyond a typical aquarium experience and immerse yourself in the world of marine life rescue at Clearwater Marine Aquarium.
Come see why The Florida Aquarium is one of the top aquariums in the country!
The Fairgrounds is home to the annual Florida State Fair.
Busch Gardens Tampa is a 335-acre African-themed animal theme park located in the city of Tampa, Florida.
Live "mermaids" perform in a natural spring at this historic park, which also has rides and camping.
The park\'s major attraction is a natural spring from which water flows year-round.
The park is 385 acres in land area with 2,400 acres submerged and 4 miles of beach.
Public beach with restrooms, showers and a water fountain, plus a bicycle rack and parking.
The Gasparilla Pirate Festival is a large parade and a host of related community events.

Located right across the street from Busch Gardens® Tampa, Adventure Island® is 30 acres of water-drenched fun in the sun featuring the ultimate combination of high-speed thrills and tropical, tranquil surroundings for guests of all ages. Race down rapids, dig your toes into the sand or relax all day in a private cabana. New at Adventure Island, hurtle high and experience a feeling of weightlessness on Colossal Curl™, Adventure Island’s newest family thrill slide.

Go beyond a typical aquarium experience and immerse yourself in the world of marine life rescue at Clearwater Marine Aquarium. Located at Clearwater Beach, Clearwater Marine Aquarium is a unique, nonprofit rescue facility dedicated to the rehabilitation and release of marine animals. See its most notable residents, Winter and Hope stars of the popular Dolphin Tale movies. Be inspired by fun, educational presentations and exhibits with all of the resident dolphins, sea turtles, pelicans, sharks, stingrays and Walle the otter. Experience Clearwater Marine Aquarium’s important ongoing mission of conservation, rescue, rehab and release.

Come see why The Florida Aquarium is one of the top aquariums in the country! Experience sharks, alligators, penguins and much more! Immerse yourself in interactive programs like Dive with the Sharks, Shark Swim and Swim with the Fishes or take a Wild Dolphin Tour on board the Bay Spirit II, a 72-foot powered catamaran. Special Behind the Scenes experiences like Penguins: Backstage Pass are unique and exciting as you come face to beak with our adorable penguins. After exploring all the exhibits inside, splash away at the Aquarium\'s new water play area, The Splash Pad!

The Fairgrounds is home to the annual Florida State Fair, always in February, always in Tampa! Featuring free entertainment, agriculture exhibits, competitive exhibits, historical village, crafts, food, and one of the largest midways in the United States.

Busch Gardens Tampa is a 335-acre African-themed animal theme park located in the city of Tampa, Florida. Busch Gardens Tampa is owned and operated by SeaWorld Parks and Entertainment and is their 2nd largest park in terms of attendance behind SeaWorld Orlando.
Live "mermaids" perform in a natural spring at this historic park, which also has rides and camping.

Lithia Springs Regional Park, is a park in Lithia, Hillsborough County, Florida, in the United States. The park\'s major attraction is a natural spring from which water flows year-round at a temperature of 72 degrees.

Honeymoon Island State Park is a Florida State Park located on Honeymoon Island, a barrier island across St. Joseph\'s Sound from Palm Harbor, Ozona, and Crystal Beach. The park is 385 acres in land area with 2,400 acres submerged and 4 miles of beach.
Public beach with restrooms, showers and a water fountain, plus a bicycle rack and parking.

The Gasparilla Pirate Festival is a large parade and a host of related community events held almost every year since 1904 in Tampa, Florida celebrating the apocryphal legend of José Gaspar, a mythical Spanish pirate who supposedly operated in Southwest Florida in the early 1800s.
400 N. Ashley Dr, Ste.2125, Tampa FL 33602
200 stores/16 restaurants. Adjacent to Tampa International Airport.
Tampa Premium Outlets is a 441,000 square-foot outlet shopping destination.
WestShore Plaza is one of two enclosed shopping malls located in the Westshore business district of Tampa, Florida.
Westfield Citrus Park is a shopping mall in Citrus Park, Florida
University Mall is a shopping mall located near the University of South Florida.

200 stores/16 restaurants. Neiman Marcus, Nordstrom, Dillard\'s, Tiffany and Co., Louis Vuitton, Gucci, Apple, Crate and Barrel, The Cheesecake Factory, The Capital Grille and Renaissance Hotel w/courtesy shuttle. Adjacent to Tampa International Airport.

Tampa Premium Outlets is a 441,000 square-foot outlet shopping destination filled with over 115 retailers, delivering great brands with 25% - 65% off every day savings. Conveniently located on the intersection of I-75 and State Road 56, this outdoor shopping Center features brands including Saks Fifth Avenue OFF 5TH, Michael Kors, Coach, Polo Ralph Lauren Factory Store, Tommy Hilfiger, Under Armour, Calvin Klein and many more. Visit Simon Guest Services located in Market Hall for more information about our VIP Shopper Club and Savings Passport.

WestShore Plaza features Macy\'s, JCPenney, Sears, Dick\'s Sporting Goods, AMC 14 Theaters, Old Navy and over 100 specialty stores. WestShore Plaza offers dining options including Maggiano\'s, Mitchell\'s Fish Market, Seasons 52, Grimaldi\'s Pizzeria, P.F. Changs, Besito Mexican and Irish 31.

Westfield Citrus Park, formerly Citrus Park Town Center, is a shopping mall in Citrus Park, Florida, that opened in March 1999. Its four anchor stores are Dillard\'s, JCPenney, Macy\'s, and Dick\'s Sporting Goods, and it also includes a Regal Cinemas multiplex theater.

University Mall, previously University Square Mall, is a shopping mall located near the University of South Florida, just north of the city limits of Tampa on Fowler Avenue; a major eight lane, east-west corridor.
8021 Citrus Park Town Center, Tampa, FL 33625
The Florida Museum of Photographic Arts
The Salvador Dalí Museum is an art museum dedicated to the works of Salvador Dalí.
The Glazer Children\'s Museum is a children\'s museum next to the Tampa Museum of Art and Curtis Hixon Park.
The Tampa Museum of Art exhibits modern and contemporary art, as well as Greek, Roman, and Etruscan antiquities.
The David A. Straz Jr. Center for the Performing Arts opened its doors as the Tampa Bay Performing Arts Center.
The Tampa Theatre features a wide range of independent, foreign, and documentary films on a daily basis.
Exhibits include coverage of the Tampa Bay area\'s first native inhabitants,
It has the finest performing arts and provide educational opportunities in the performing arts to all segments.
The MidFlorida Credit Union Amphitheatre\' is the largest concert-only facility in the Tampa Bay Area.
Gallery features workshops, diverse photographic displays in permanent and rotating exhibits
All of the vehicles displayed are from the collection of Alain Cerf, a French entrepreneur.

The Salvador Dalí Museum is an art museum in St. Petersburg, Florida, United States, dedicated to the works of Salvador Dalí. It houses the largest collection of Dalí\'s works outside Europe. It is located on the downtown St. Petersburg waterfront by 5th Avenue Southeast, Bay Shore Drive, and Dan Wheldon Way.

The Glazer Children\'s Museum is a children\'s museum located in downtown Tampa, Florida, next to the Tampa Museum of Art and Curtis Hixon Park, alongside the Tampa Riverwalk. It is part of the Waterfront Arts District.
The Tampa Museum of Art is located in downtown Tampa, Florida. It exhibits modern and contemporary art, as well as Greek, Roman, and Etruscan antiquities.
The David A. Straz Jr. Center for the Performing Arts opened its doors as the Tampa Bay Performing Arts Center, Tampa, Florida in July 1987 and has welcomed more than 16 million guests.

The Tampa Theatre is a historic U.S. theater and city landmark in the Uptown District of Tampa, Florida. The theatre features a wide range of independent, foreign, and documentary films on a daily basis.

Tampa Bay History Center is a history museum in Tampa, Florida. Exhibits include coverage of the Tampa Bay area\'s first native inhabitants, Spanish conquistadors, and historical figures who shaped the area\'s history, as well as a reproduction of a 1920s cigar store.

Ruth Eckerd Hall is a 73,000-square-foot (6,800 m2) performing arts venue, located in Clearwater, Florida, in the Tampa Bay area and is part of the Richard B. Baumgardner Center for the Performing Arts.

The MidFlorida Credit Union Amphitheatre\' is the largest concert-only facility in the Tampa Bay Area. Originally Ford Amphitheatre and formerly Amphitheatre and Live Nation Amphitheatre it is an outdoor amphitheatre in Tampa, Florida.
Gallery features workshops, diverse photographic displays in permanent and rotating exhibits

The Tampa Bay Automobile Museum, located in Pinellas Park, Florida in the Tampa Bay Area, displays historic automobiles from the 20th century. All of the vehicles displayed are from the collection of Alain Cerf, a French entrepreneur.
3301 Gateway Centre Blvd, Pinellas Park, FL 33782
The tasting is open to the public and features our forward thinking beers as well as beer from other local Florida breweries.
Cigar City Brewing is a part of CANarchy, a craft brewing collective that represents the largest canned craft beer supplier in the country.
Ulele overlooks the Hillsborough River in Tampa Heights. Lunch and dinner served daily.
Celebrate happy hour or a friendly night out with our knowledgeable bartenders.
Visit us at The Brew Bus Terminal in Seminole Heights for Trivia Night, Toast Brunch, or one of our other weekly events.
Lively Ybor City is known for boutiques and vintage shops on 7th Avenue, which also hosts Cuban and Latin American eateries.
The courtyard venue has hosted numerous concerts for local and mainstream artists.
Adirondack decor surrounds at this high-end nightclub with 2 levels and a packed calendar of events.
Laid-back chain eatery featuring Caribbean entrees and tropical cocktails amid beachy decor.
Hyde Park Village is an upscale open-air shopping district located in the neighborhood of Hyde Park in Tampa, Florida.
Angry Chair Brewing is located in the heart of Seminole Heights. The tasting is open to the public and features our forward thinking beers as well as beer from other local Florida breweries.

Cigar City Brewing, makers of Jai Alai IPA® and Hunahpu’s Imperial Stout®, was founded in 2009 by Joey Redner with the goal of creating world-class beer that reflected the flavors and history of the Tampa region. This unique approach resonated with local and national markets and the brewery has quickly to produce over 90,000 barrels of beer annually. Along with Oskar Blues Brewery, Perrin Brewing, Squatters Craft Beers and Wasatch Brewery, Cigar City Brewing is a part of CANarchy, a craft brewing collective that represents the largest canned craft beer supplier in the country.

Located on the Tampa Riverwalk, Ulele overlooks the Hillsborough River in Tampa Heights. Serving native-inspired foods and spirits. Intricately flavored, visually appealing dishes prepared on our round 10’ barbacoa grill. Lunch and dinner served daily. On-site brewery. 400 yards from the Straz Center. Outdoor bar and outdoor seating with waterfront views. Beer and cocktails may be ordered to go and served in a special cup, which allows guests to drink legally along the 2.4-mile Tampa Riverwalk. Closed Thanksgiving and Christmas. In addition to auto, bike or pedestrian arrivals, you also can boat, canoe or kayak and dock next door at Water Works Park. A second location is at Tampa International Airport, in Airside C, with Southwest and Frontier Airlines. Please see our website for the most current menu.

Enjoy Florida inspired, Tampa brewed craft beer in our tasting room. Centrally located at the crossroads of Ybor City and Downtown Tampa, celebrate happy hour or a friendly night out with our knowledgeable bartenders.

We have been sharing our love for beer since 2011 when we began our journey as a local brewery tour company. A year later we turned our tour bus into a mobile tasting room by brewing our own beer. Now, we have built a state of the art brewery and tasting room to share these awesome beers with the world. Come visit us at The Brew Bus Terminal and Tasting Room in Seminole Heights for Trivia Night, Toast Brunch, or one of our other weekly events.

Lively Ybor City is known for boutiques and vintage shops on 7th Avenue, which also hosts Cuban and Latin American eateries. The Centro Ybor mall offers indie fast food, bars, and a cinema. Housed in a 1920s bakery, Ybor City State Museum has exhibits on the cigar industry and the area’s immigrant communities. The GaYBOR district around 7th Avenue and 15th Street attracts a diverse crowd to its bars and clubs.

Jannus Live is an outdoor music venue in St. Petersburg, Florida. Located in the Downtown St. Petersburg Historic District, the courtyard venue has hosted numerous concerts for local and mainstream artists.
Adirondack decor surrounds at this high-end nightclub with 2 levels and a packed calendar of events.
Laid-back chain eatery featuring Caribbean entrees and tropical cocktails amid beachy decor.

Hyde Park Village is an upscale open-air shopping district located in the neighborhood of Hyde Park in Tampa, Florida, United States. The center is situated in several buildings located between Swann and Rome Avenues, just a few blocks east of the SoHo district.
11921 North Dale Mabry Hwy, Tampa, Florida 33618
3045 N Rocky Point Dr E, Tampa, FL 33607
Festive gay bar with a pool table, happy hours and live entertainment in a dimly-lit setting.
This LGBT-friendly adults-only resort is 6 miles from the beach and The Dali Museum, as well as Downtown\'s historic district.
Vibrant LGBT nightclub with a large dance floor and entertainment such as DJs and drag shows.
Lively, gay-friendly lounge with several rooms, a cozy dance floor, drag shows and sidewalk tables.
Visit us at The Brew Bus Terminal and Tasting Room for Trivia Night, Toast Brunch, or one of our other weekly events.
Festive gay bar with a pool table, happy hours and live entertainment in a dimly-lit setting.
This LGBT-friendly adults-only resort is 6 miles from the beach and The Dali Museum, as well as Downtown\'s historic district.
Vibrant LGBT nightclub with a large dance floor and entertainment such as DJs and drag shows.
Lively, gay-friendly lounge with several rooms, a cozy dance floor, drag shows and sidewalk tables.

We have been sharing our love for beer since 2011 when we began our journey as a local brewery tour company. A year later we turned our tour bus into a mobile tasting room by brewing our own beer. Now, we have built a state of the art brewery and tasting room to share these awesome beers with the world. Come visit us at The Brew Bus Terminal and Tasting Room in Seminole Heights for Trivia Night, Toast Brunch, or one of our other weekly events.
1110 Central Avenue North, St. Petersburg, FL 33705
Local mainstay serving homestyle Northern Italian cuisine and wines in a warm-hued storefront space.
Thin-crust pizza by the pie or slice made with New York water at a casual, counter-serve spot.
Family-owned and operated for more than 113 years and award-winning Spanish/Cuban cuisine and wine list.
Modern hangout offering upbeat Mexican menu and drinks for brunch, lunch and dinner.
Family-run eatery serving a menu of Cuban and Spanish standards in homey surroundings.
Local mainstay serving homestyle Northern Italian cuisine and wines in a warm-hued storefront space.
Thin-crust pizza by the pie or slice made with New York water at a casual, counter-serve spot.

Columbia is Florida’s Oldest RestaurantSM, founded in Tampa\'s historic Ybor City in 1905. Family-owned and operated for more than 113 years, earning acclaim for old-world charm, and award-winning Spanish/Cuban cuisine and wine list.
Modern hangout offering upbeat Mexican menu and drinks for brunch, lunch and dinner.
Family-run eatery serving a menu of Cuban and Spanish standards in homey surroundings.
Come sunset, Pier 60 hosts a nightly festival with street performers and craft vendors.
Features a unique urban design, sustainable construction, and operational features such as water for irrigation and LED lighting.
Tampa Riverwalk is a 2.6-mile-long open space and pedestrian trail development along the Hillsborough River in Tampa, Florida.
The Bob Graham Sunshine Skyway Bridge is a bridge with a cable-stayed main span and a total length of 21,877 feet.
Feel the thrill of skydiving without jumping out of an airplane. A facility powered by a state-of-the-art vertical wind tunnel.

Laid-back Clearwater Beach is known for its namesake stretch of soft, white sand, which draws visitors year-round for jet-skiing, parasailing, and stand-up paddleboarding in its calm waters. Cyclists and rollerbladers glide along a winding beachfront promenade lined with casual seafood restaurants and cafes. Come sunset, Pier 60 hosts a nightly festival with street performers and craft vendors.

Curtis Hixon Waterfront Park is an 8-acre public park located along the Hillsborough river in downtown Tampa, Florida that opened in its current configuration in 2010. It is adjacent to the Tampa Riverwalk, Florida Museum of Photographic Arts, Tampa Museum of Art, Glazer Children\'s Museum, and Rivergate Tower.
Tampa Riverwalk is a 2.6-mile-long open space and pedestrian trail development along the Hillsborough River in Tampa, Florida.

The Bob Graham Sunshine Skyway Bridge, known to locals as the Sunshine Skyway Bridge or more casually the Skyway, is a bridge spanning Tampa Bay, Florida, with a cable-stayed main span, and a total length of 21,877 feet.

Feel the thrill of skydiving without jumping out of an airplane. It\'s true! Head to iFLY Tampa, a premier indoor skydiving facility powered by a state-of-the-art vertical wind tunnel. After a training session, you\'ll experience free-fall conditions with the help of an instructor. No experience is necessary, and afterward, you can take home a personalized flight certificate.
400 N. Ashley Dr, Ste.2125, Tampa FL 33602
